ARABIC: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those before them also denied the truth and the punishment came upon them from where they did not expect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Those before them had denied, then punishment had overtaken them is from a quarter they did not suspect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Their predecessors gave the lie to the Truth and then chastisement came upon them from whence they could not imagine.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Those who lived before them had also rejected Our revelations. Thus, the torment struck them and they did not even realize where it came from.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those before them had denied, therefore the punishment came to them from a place they did not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Those before them denied, and so the torment came on them from directions they perceived not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Those before them rejected (prophets), therefore there came to them the chastisement from whence they perceived not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Those that were before them cried lies, then the chastisement came upon them from whence they were not aware;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Those before them denied, and so the doom came on them whence they knew not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those before them also denied the truth, and the punishment fell on them from where they did not expect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Those before them belied, wherefore the torment came on them whence they knew not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Those who were before them impugned [the apostles], whereat the punishment overtook them whence they were not aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those before them (also) rejected (revelation), and so the Punishment came to them from directions they did not perceive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Those before them belied, and so the torment came on them from directions they perceived not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those who went before them also belied, then Our punishment overtook them from where they were unaware;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those before them also denied the truth, so the penalty came upon them from where they did not perceive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Those before them denied, and punishment came upon them from where they did not perceive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [39:25] Those who were before them denied, their messengers with regard to the coming of the chastisement; and so the chastisement came on them whence they were not aware, in a way that would never have occurred to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Those before them) those before your people, Muhammad, such as the people of Hud, Salih and Shu'ayb as well as others (denied, and so the doom came on them whence they knew not) it was coming.
